segments.text: What case do you have against the police ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I want to take them to court for arresting me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There was no reason for them to arrest me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: They let you go , didn ’ t they ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They released me the next morning .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: They detained you at the station ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That ’ s exactly what they did .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: They said I matched the description of a robber .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ m definitely taking them to court .
segments.speaker: S2
